summary: "Green Lantern" (2011) is an American superhero movie about Hal Jordan, a test pilot who joins an alien police force called the Green Lantern Corps. He gets a ring that gives him superpowers and must fight Parallax, a powerful enemy. The film stars Ryan Reynolds and was directed by Martin Campbell. It was made after years of planning and filming in Louisiana. Though it was meant to start a new DC movie series, bad reviews and low earnings made Warner Bros. change plans and start the DC Extended Universe with "Man of Steel" instead.
title: Green Lantern (film)
